thread.title: Top recruit trolls Florida and Florida State with one savage Signing Day prank | For The Win
thread.title_full: Top recruit trolls Florida and Florida State with one savage Signing Day prank | For The Win

author: Charles Curtis
title: Top recruit trolls Florida and Florida State with one savage Signing Day prank | For The Win
text:
Top recruit trolls Florida and Florida State with one savage Signing Day prank Top recruit trolls Florida and Florida State with one savage Signing Day prank By Charles Curtis February 1, 2017 9:59 am Follow @bycharlescurtis 581 shares By: Charles Curtis | February 1, 2017 9:59 am Follow @bycharlescurtis 
To all of the Florida and Florida State fans watching linebacker Levi Jones announce where he was committing on Wednesday, I’m sorry. 
This is one savage prank Jones, a four-star linebacker from Texas , pulled off on ESPNU: He unzipped his sweater to reveal a Florida shirt … but then took that off to show off Florida State threads. 
But he wasn’t done! Then came the final choice, USC: Levi Jones commits to Florida! Wait….Florida State! Wait… 
USC! 
— ESPNU (@ESPNU) February 1, 2017 
For anyone who doesn’t root for the Gators or Seminoles, the reaction from the crowd and announcers is fantastic — they’re stunned when he tears off the Florida shirt, then don’t know how to react when the USC logo finally shows up, with everyone wondering if he had yet another shirt underneath. 
A four-star prank, for sure.
